lastIntent:
fix: enable mock API for production/static deployments

The shouldUseMockAPI() function was not checking DISABLE_NETWORK_CALLS,
causing auth flows to fail in production because:
- DISABLE_NETWORK_CALLS is true in production builds
- But shouldUseMockAPI() returned false (no USE_MOCK_API flag)
- Real API calls were attempted but blocked/failed

Now shouldUseMockAPI() returns true when DISABLE_NETWORK_CALLS is set,
ensuring the mock authentication works in static deployments.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

rawCommit:
fix: enable mock API for production/static deployments

The shouldUseMockAPI() function was not checking DISABLE_NETWORK_CALLS,
causing auth flows to fail in production because:
- DISABLE_NETWORK_CALLS is true in production builds
- But shouldUseMockAPI() returned false (no USE_MOCK_API flag)
- Real API calls were attempted but blocked/failed

Now shouldUseMockAPI() returns true when DISABLE_NETWORK_CALLS is set,
ensuring the mock authentication works in static deployments.
